entry.title: Devops engineer
entry.text:
#вакансия #devops #azure #remote #спб #fulltime #релокация 

Senior DevOps Remote Engineer (Azure)

City: Saint-Petersburg, metro Mayakovskaya | Chernyshevskaya 
Format: office or remote (both are possible)
Salary: ₽220-300k

Project: We are BeKitzur and now we are looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer to support and drive innovative collaboration software products used by dozens of thousands of clients across the world. 
The platform is an Azure-hosted solution and offers you a great opportunity in driving state-of-the-art CI/CD, security, monitoring and DB management. This is a great position for an energetic and ambitious professional to get to the next career step and become a member of a stable and growing international company.

Responsibilities:
🔹Set up the best monitoring ever - unified, transparent and flexible
🔹Improve our CI/CD process and automation to deliver faster, more frequent and reliable releases
🔹Migrate databases to more secure and powerful clusters
🔹Migrate applications to Kubernetes
🔹Increase High-Availability and Reliability of applications and DB clusters
🔹Optimize Azure costs and design more cost-effective DevOps solutions
🔹Improve the existing DevOps processes and technologies, such as CI/CD, monitoring, logs aggregation, and security
🔹Participate in all DevOps decisions together with Senior engineers and Tech leads
🔹Define and implement the security architecture to ensure data security at rest and in transit, application security, key management, identity management, authentication, and authorization with OIDC and OAuth2, infrastructure security with Azure VNets, NSGs, UDR, etc.

Required Skills and Experience:
🔹5 years of experience in IT with good knowledge in Linux
🔹Experience in maintaining a production data processing system
🔹Hands-on experience with git, Jenkins, Docker, and MySQL
🔹Azure Networking - Azure Virtual Networks, ExpressRoute, NSG, App Service Environment
🔹Azure PAAS Services Security and Provisioning
🔹Cloud Security - Azure Key Vault, HSTS, SSL/TLS Ingress Control
🔹Cloud monitoring - Experience with Azure Log Analytics, Azure Monitor, DataDog
🔹Experience with any configuration management tool (Ansible, Saltstack, Chef, Puppet, etc), Ansible preferred
🔹Hands-on experience with cloud technologies (Azure in our case)
🔹Bash and Python scripting skills
🔹Good written and spoken English

Benefits:
🔹Extremely interesting complex products
🔹The most modern technology stack
🔹Wonderful result-oriented team of senior professionals
🔹Support for all your Cloud studies and certificates (you will have access and we will pay for exams)
🔹Friendly atmosphere
🔹Competitive salary
🔹Medical insurance, sport, English classes in the office
🔹Business trips to the US (Silicon Valley)
🔹Relocation package to St.Petersburg
🔹Opportunity to build a career in a growing branch of the stable US company
🔹Professional growth in the international business environment

📩
Откликнуться: @Khabibulin_it
